title: Conscientiousness
info: Conscientiousness is a fundamental personality trait that reflects the tendency to be responsible, organized, hard-working, goal-directed, and to adhere to norms and rules.
quote: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr

title: Agreeableness
info: Agreeableness is a personality trait manifesting itself in individual behavioral characteristics that are perceived as kind, sympathetic, cooperative, warm, and considerate.
quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
author: Isaac Newton

title: Neuroticism
info: Neuroticism refers to the tendency to experience negative feelings.
quote: When someone tell me 'no', it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them.
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

title: Openness to Experience
info: Openness to experience refers to a tendency towards intellectual curiosity, aesthetic sensitivity, liberal values, and emotional differentiation.
quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
author: Erma Bombeck

title: Extraversion
info: Extraversion refers to the tendency to focus on gratification obtained from outside the self.
quote: There is no such thing as a pure extrovert or a pure introvert. Such a man would be in the lunatic asylum.
author: Carl Jung
